title: PLC-Based Workshop for Strengthening Math Teacher Collaboration and Collective Efficacy

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mathematics pedagogy and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based online collaboration tools with parallel face-to-face discussion sessions

learning_goals: Participating teachers can implement three or more collaborative strategies based on learning goals agreed upon in Professional Learning Communities (PLCs).
Teachers can derive two lesson improvement plans through peer feedback and reflective dialogue.
A 20% or higher improvement in collective efficacy survey scores compared to baseline can be achieved.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
